formElement.label: Environment Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The project containing the existing environment, or where the new environment will be created.

formElement.label: Environment Name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of an existing environment that contains the Azure Container Service-backend cluster to be discovered. If the environment does not already exist, provide the Azure Container Service connection details below for discovery, and a new environment will be created.

formElement.label: Cluster Name:
formElement.documentation: In an existing environment, provide the name of the ElectricFlow cluster representing the Azure Container Service cluster whose deployed services are to be discovered. If the environment does not already exist, provide the name of the cluster to be created in the new environment.

formElement.label: Tenant ID:
formElement.documentation: Tenant ID of the Azure Account. Required if the cluster does not exist in EF.

formElement.label: Subscription ID:
formElement.documentation: Subscription ID of the Azure Account. Required if the cluster does not exist in EF.

formElement.label: Client ID:
formElement.documentation: The Client ID of the Service principal created in Azure. Required if the cluster does not exist in EF.

formElement.label: Azure Secret Key:
formElement.documentation: The Key of the Service principal created in Azure. Required if the cluster does not exist in EF.

formElement.label: Private Key:
formElement.documentation: The private key that should be used for cluster creation and communication. Required if the cluster does not exist in EF.

formElement.label: Azure Container Service Namespace:
formElement.documentation: The name of the Azure Container Service namespace within which the deployed services should be discovered. Default to 'default' namespace.

formElement.label: Project Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of project in which the discovered microservices will be created.

formElement.label: Create Microservices within an Application:
formElement.documentation: (Optional) Select to create all discovered services in the Azure Container Service namespace within one application in ElectricFlow. If selected, then the application name must be provided. If unselected, microservices will be created at the top-level in the project.

formElement.label: Application Name:
formElement.documentation: The name of the new application that will contain the microservices. Required only if 'Create Microservices within an Application' is selected.
